00050                 class KGE_API MouseState
00051                 {
00052                 public:
00053                         MouseState() : width(50), height(50), buttons(0) {};
00054 
00058                         mutable int width, height;
00059 
00061                         Axis X;
00062 
00064                         Axis Y;
00065 
00067                         Axis Z;
00068 
00070                         int buttons;
00071 
00073                         inline bool buttonDown( MouseButtonID button ) const
00074                         {
00075                                 return ((buttons & ( 1L << button )) == 0) ? false : true;
00076                         }
00077 
00079                         void clear()
00080                         {
00081                                 X.clear();
00082                                 Y.clear();
00083                                 Z.clear();
00084                                 buttons = 0;
00085                         }
00086 
00087                 }; // MouseState
